title: `eth_subscribe` with `includeTransactions` is missing transaction type
body:

### Description
Missing transaction field `type` when using websockets `eth_subscribe`  with `["newPendingTransactions",{"includeTransactions":true}]` .

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
Reproducible using [`websocat`](https://github.com/vi/websocat)
```
echo '{"method":"eth_subscribe","params":["newPendingTransactions",{"includeTransactions":true}],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' | websocat --no-close ws://<server>:<port> | jq
```

Transaction output sample on Besu:
```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "eth_subscription",
  "params": {
    "subscription": "0x21",
    "result": {
      "from": "0x46bc3e6c2f954fc9ab6d6c03d34592524b7b7bbd",
      "gas": "0x26c1f",
      "gasPrice": "0x596831eb",
      "hash": "0xf0ae2220686b34dc10f0e1c91df3ea74efc57fe243124d26cb09ff921b16fee7",
      "input": "0x",
      "nonce": "0x2",
      "to": "0x1643e812ae58766192cf7d2cf9567df2c37e9b7f",
      "value": "0x38d7ea4c68000",
      "v": "0x2d",
      "r": "0xc1dedbc918f1179379da6d684cf788a50d200073b8f78aa44c5fe148c360c784",
      "s": "0x6011be2beda392a630095039f8d5ba4b9c58fc21e0eb3bdea3a9482ec88828d8"
    }
  }
}
```

Querying the same tx using `eth_getTransactionByHash` **does return the `type` field**:
```
curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionByHash","params":["0xf0ae2220686b34dc10f0e1c91df3ea74efc57fe243124d26cb09ff921b16fee7"],"id":1}' http://<server>:<port>
```
```json
{
  "jsonrpc" : "2.0",
  "id" : 1,
  "result" : {
    "blockHash" : "0x3a264992cd8d03271c618a01dc94c0a1a12de0d5526ad9f7d2dcece2135ef6a3",
    "blockNumber" : "0x8c43e8",
    "chainId" : "0x5",
    "from" : "0x46bc3e6c2f954fc9ab6d6c03d34592524b7b7bbd",
    "gas" : "0x26c1f",
    "gasPrice" : "0x596831eb",
    "hash" : "0xf0ae2220686b34dc10f0e1c91df3ea74efc57fe243124d26cb09ff921b16fee7",
    "input" : "0x",
    "nonce" : "0x2",
    "to" : "0x1643e812ae58766192cf7d2cf9567df2c37e9b7f",
    "transactionIndex" : "0xd",
    "type" : "0x0",
    "value" : "0x38d7ea4c68000",
    "v" : "0x2d",
    "r" : "0xc1dedbc918f1179379da6d684cf788a50d200073b8f78aa44c5fe148c360c784",
    "s" : "0x6011be2beda392a630095039f8d5ba4b9c58fc21e0eb3bdea3a9482ec88828d8"
  }
}
```

### Versions (Add all that apply)
`besu/v23.4.0/linux-x86_64/openjdk-java-17`

It's also worth noting that both geth and nethermind now support a new boolean argument in both `newPendingTransactions` and `newHeads` in order to recieve the full transactions/blocks respectively (replacing `includeTransactions`), for more info see https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/5299
